original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Vessantaravagga
analyzed: vessantara vagga

original: 9. Ekantasukhanibbānapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, kiṁ ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, udāhu dukkhena missan”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kim ekanta sukham nibbāne udāhu dukkhena

original: “Ekantasukhaṁ, mahārāja, nibbānaṁ, dukkhena amissan”ti.
analyzed: ekanta sukha mahā rāja nibbāna dukkhena

original: “Na mayaṁ taṁ, bhante nāgasena, vacanaṁ saddahāma ‘ekantasukhaṁ nibbānan’ti, evamettha
analyzed: na mayam te bhante nāgasena vacanam saddahāmaḥ ekanta sukham nibbānan ti evam ettha

original: mayaṁ, bhante nāgasena, paccema ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhena missan’ti, kāraṇañcettha upalabhāma
analyzed: bhante nāgasena paccema nibbānam dukkhena kāraṇam ca ittha upalabhāma

original: ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhena missan’ti.
analyzed: nibbānam dukkhena missanti

original: Katamaṁ ettha kāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: katamam ettha

original: Ye te, bhante nāgasena, nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, tesaṁ dissati kāyassa ca cittassa ca
analyzed: ye te bhante nāgasena nibbānam pariyesanti tesam dissati kāyassa ca cittassa ca

original: ātāpo paritāpo ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhārapariggaho middhassa ca uparodho āyatanānañca
analyzed: ātāpaḥ paritāpaḥ ṭhāna caṅkama nisajja āsayana āhāra pariggaho middhassa ca uparodhaḥ

original: paṭipīḷanaṁ dhanadhaññapiyañātimittappajahanaṁ.
analyzed: paṭipīḍanam

original: Ye keci loke sukhitā sukhasamappitā, te sabbepi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi āyatane ramenti
analyzed: ye keci loke te sabbe api pañcahi kāmaguṇehi āyatane ramenti

original: brūhenti, manāpikamanāpikabahuvidhasubhanimittena rūpena cakkhuṁ ramenti brūhenti,
analyzed: brūhenti manāpika manāpika bahuvidha subha nimittena rūpena cakkhum ramenti brūhenti

original: manāpikamanāpikagītavāditabahuvidhasubhanimittena saddena sotaṁ ramenti brūhenti,
analyzed: manāpika manāpika gīta vādita bahuvidha subha nimittena saddena sotam ramenti

original: manāpikamanāpikapupphaphalapattatacamūlasārabahuvidhasubhanimittena gandhena ghānaṁ
analyzed: manāpika manāpika puppha phala patta taca mūla sāra bahuvidha subha nimittena gandhena

original: ramenti brūhenti, manāpikamanāpikakhajjabhojjaleyyapeyyasāyanīyabahuvidhasubhanimittena
analyzed: ramenti manāpika manāpika khajja bhojja leyya peyya sāyanīya bahuvidha subha nimittena

original: rasena jivhaṁ ramenti brūhenti, manāpikamanāpikasaṇhasukhumamudumaddavabahuvidhasubhanimittena
analyzed: rasena jivham ramenti manāpika manāpika saṇha sukhuma mudumat dava bahuvidha subha nimittena

original: phassena kāyaṁ ramenti brūhenti, manāpikamanāpikakalyāṇapāpakasubhāsubhabahuvidhavitakkamanasikārena
analyzed: phassena kāyam ramenti brūhenti manāpika manāpika kalyāṇa pāpaka subha asubha bahuvidha vitakka manasikārena

original: manaṁ ramenti brūhenti.
analyzed: manam ramenti

original: Tumhe taṁ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanobrūhanaṁ hanatha upahanatha, chindatha upacchindatha, rundhatha uparundhatha.
analyzed: tumhe tam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ brūhanam hanatha upahanatha chindatha upacchindatha rundhatha uparundhatha

original: Tena kāyopi paritapati, cittampi paritapati, kāye paritatte kāyikadukkhavedanaṁ vediyati, citte paritatte cetasikadukkhavedanaṁ vedayati.
analyzed: tena kāyaḥ api paritapati cittam api paritapati kāye paritatte kāyika dukkha vedanam vediyati citte paritatte cetasika dukkha vedanam vedayati

original: Nanu māgaṇḍiyopi paribbājako bhagavantaṁ garahamāno evamāha ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
analyzed: nanu māgaṇḍiyaḥ api paribbājakaḥ bhagavantam garahamānaḥ evam āha bhūnahu samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ iti

original: Idamettha kāraṇaṁ, yenāhaṁ kāraṇena brūmi ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhena missan’”ti.
analyzed: idam ettha kāraṇa yena aham kāraṇena brūmi nibbānam dukkhena

original: “Na hi, mahārāja, nibbānaṁ dukkhena missaṁ, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: na hi mahā rāja nibbānam dukkhena missaḥ ekanta sukham nibbāna

original: Yaṁ pana tvaṁ, mahārāja, brūsi ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhan’ti, netaṁ dukkhaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma,
analyzed: yam pana tva mahā rāja brūsi nibbānam dukkhanti na itam dukkham nibbānam nāma

original: nibbānassa pana sacchikiriyāya pubbabhāgo eso, nibbānapariyesanaṁ etaṁ, ekantasukhaṁyeva,
analyzed: nibbānassa pana sacchikiriyāya pubba bhāgaḥ esaḥ nibbāna pariyesanam ete ekanta sukhayā iva

original: mahārāja, nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja nibbāna na dukkhena missa

original: Ettha kāraṇaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: ettha kāraṇam vadāmi

original: Atthi, mahārāja, rājūnaṁ rajjasukhaṁ nāmā”ti?
analyzed: atthi mahā rāja rajja sukham nāma ati

original: “Āma, bhante, atthi rājūnaṁ rajjasukhan”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante atthi

original: “Api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, rajjasukhaṁ dukkhena missan”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho ta mahā rāja rajja sukham dukkhena missanti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, rājāno paccante kupite tesaṁ paccantanissitānaṁ paṭisedhāya
analyzed: kissa pana te mahā rāja rājānaḥ paccante kupite tesam paccanta nissitānam paṭisedhāya

original: amaccehi pariṇāyakehi bhaṭehi balatthehi parivutā pavāsaṁ gantvā ḍaṁsamakasavātātapapaṭipīḷitā
analyzed: amaccehi pariṇāyakehi bhaṭehi balatthehi parivutā pavāsam gantvā ḍasamakasa vāta ātapa paṭipīḍitā

original: samavisame paridhāvanti, mahāyuddhañca karonti, jīvitasaṁsayañca pāpuṇantī”ti?
analyzed: sama visame paridhāvanti mahā yuddhañca karonti jīvita sasayam ca pāpuṇanti iti

original: “Netaṁ, bhante nāgasena, rajjasukhaṁ nāma, rajjasukhassa pariyesanāya pubbabhāgo
analyzed: na ita bhante nāgasena rajjasukham nāma rajja sukhassa pariyesanāya pubba bhāgaḥ

original: eso, dukkhena, bhante nāgasena, rājāno rajjaṁ pariyesitvā rajjasukhaṁ anubhavanti,
analyzed: esaḥ dukkhena bhante nāgasena rājānaḥ rajjam pariyesitvā rajja sukham anubhavanti

original: evaṁ, bhante nāgasena, rajjasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ rajjasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
analyzed: eva bhante nāgasena rajja sukham dukkhena amissa aññam tam rajja sukha aññam dukkhanti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ekanta sukham nibbāna na dukkhena missa

original: Ye pana taṁ nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ
analyzed: ye pana tam nibbānam pariyesanti te kāyam ca cittam ca ātāpetvā ṭhāna caṅkama nisajja āsayana āhāra

original: pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā
analyzed: pariggahetvā middham uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḍetvā kāyam ca jīvitam ca pariccajitvā

original: dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti, nihatapaccāmittā
analyzed: dukkhena nibbānam pariyesitvā ekanta sukham nibbānam anubhavanti nihata paccāmittāḥ

original: viya rājāno rajjasukhaṁ.
analyzed: viya rājānaḥ

original: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhanti.
analyzed: eva mahā rāja ekanta sukham nibbāna na dukkhena missa aññam nibbāna aññam dukkhanti

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānanti.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi ekanta sukham nibbāna na dukkhena aññam dukkha aññam nibbānanti

original: Atthi, mahārāja, ācariyānaṁ sippavantānaṁ sippasukhaṁ nāmā”ti?
analyzed: atthi mahā rāja ācariyānam sippavantānam sippa sukham nāma ati

original: “Āma, bhante, atthi ācariyānaṁ sippavantānaṁ sippasukhan”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante atthi ācariyānam sippavantānam sippa sukhanti

original: “Api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, sippasukhaṁ dukkhena missan”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho ta mahā rāja sippa sukham dukkhena missanti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, ācariyā ācariyānaṁ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānena udakāharaṇagharasammajjanadantakaṭṭhamukhodakānuppadānena
analyzed: kissa pana te mahā rāja ācariyāḥ ācariyānam abhivādana paccuṭṭhānena udaka āharaṇa ghara sammajjana danta kaṭṭha mukha udaka anuppadānena

original: ucchiṭṭhapaṭiggahaṇaucchādananahāpanapādaparikammena sakacittaṁ nikkhipitvā paracittānuvattanena
analyzed: ucchiṭṭha paṭiggahaṇa aucchādana nahāpana pāda parikammena saka cittam nikkhipitvā para citta anuvattanena

original: dukkhaseyyāya visamabhojanena kāyaṁ ātāpentī”ti?
analyzed: dukkha seyyāya visama bhojanena kāyaṃ ātāpenti iti

original: “Netaṁ, bhante nāgasena, sippasukhaṁ nāma, sippapariyesanāya pubbabhāgo eso, dukkhena,
analyzed: neta bhante nāgasena sippasukham nāma sippa pariyesanāya pubbabhāgaḥ esaḥ dukkhena

original: bhante nāgasena, ācariyā sippaṁ pariyesitvā sippasukhaṁ anubhavanti, evaṁ, bhante
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ācariyā sippam pariyesitvā sippa sukham anubhavanti eva bhante

original: nāgasena, sippasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ sippasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
analyzed: nāgasena sippa sukham dukkhena amissa aññam tam sippa sukha aññam dukkhanti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ekanta sukham nibbāna na dukkhena missa

original: Ye pana taṁ nibbānaṁ pariyesanti, te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ
analyzed: ye pana tam nibbānam pariyesanti te kāyam ca cittam ca ātāpetvā ṭhāna caṅkama nisajja āsayana āhāra

original: pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā
analyzed: pariggahetvā middham uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḍetvā kāyam ca jīvitam ca pariccajitvā

original: dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti, ācariyā viya sippasukhaṁ.
analyzed: dukkhena nibbānam pariyesitvā ekanta sukham nibbānam anubhavanti ācariyāḥ viya sippa sukha

original: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānan”ti.
analyzed: eva mahā rāja ekanta sukham nibbāna na dukkhena aññam dukkha aññam nibbānanti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Ekantasukhanibbānapañho navamo.
analyzed: ekanta sukha nibbāna pañhaḥ navamaḥ
